segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, where the children are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's positioned right in front of an open cabinet, which seems to hold something desirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is plunged into a jar clearly labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly wobbly, its legs splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see it tipping backward at any second, a truly dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, her arm outstretched, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has that look of anticipation, completely caught up in their little plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just so angry that they are being so reckless without adult supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hurting himself makes my stomach clench.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These children are clearly up to no good, and their mother is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost a crime that no one is intervening in this risky game.
segments.speaker: PAR
